analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#436-445):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#438)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#440-442)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#456-466):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#458-459)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#459-463)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#464)

DNTXCrowdsale.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#744-750) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x61904fa1d7b7b1df21bd6c3053a07a04ab6a87af.sol#746-747)
